dcterms:description: The dataset is a combination of speech data from different domains, including approximately 17.6 hours of speech data from the Common Voice Hindi (CVH) dataset, with minor corrections made by annotators, and the rest from the Prasar Bharati archive.
dcterms:title: Common Voice Hindi (CVH) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Bharathi Pilar
dcterms:description: The benchmark IISc-MILE Tamil speech corpus comprises approximately 150 hours of train and test speech dataset.
dcterms:title: IISc-MILE Tamil Dataset

dcterms:creator: Bharathi Pilar
dcterms:description: The benchmark IISc-MILE Kannada dataset comprises approximately 350 hours of training and test speech dataset.
dcterms:title: IISc-MILE Kannada Dataset

dcterms:description: The KathBath (KB) test-known dataset is used to evaluate the trained TeLeS-WLC models for the three languages.
dcterms:title: KathBath (KB) Test-Known Dataset
